00082 void clTriangle::GetFaceNodes(const int faceIndex, int *faceNodes) const
00083 {
00084   /*
00085   ** Returns the indeces of the nodes in tetrahedron system, given the face index
00086   */
00087 
00088   try
00089   {
00090     if(faceIndex<0 || faceIndex>=GetNumberFaces())
00091     {
00092       char message[MESLEN];
00093       sprintf(message, "Invalid face entry.\n  FACE = %d\n", faceIndex);
00094       throw clException("clTriangle", "GetFaceNodes", message);
00095     }
00096     else
00097     {
00098       switch(faceIndex)
00099       {
00100         case 0:
00101           faceNodes[0]=1;
00102           faceNodes[1]=2;
00103           break;
00104         case 1:
00105           faceNodes[0]=2;
00106           faceNodes[1]=0;
00107           break;
00108         case 2:
00109           faceNodes[0]=0;
00110           faceNodes[1]=1;
00111           break;
00112         default:
00113           char message[MESLEN];
00114           sprintf(message, "Invalid face entry.\n  FACE = %d\n", faceIndex);
00115           throw clException("clElement2D", "GetFaceNodes", message);
00116           break;
00117       }
00118     }
00119   }
00120 
00121   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00122   {
00123     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTriangle::GetFaceNodes");
00124     throw EX;
00125   }
00126 }
00127 
00128 int clTriangle::GetFaceNode(const int faceIndex, const int nodeIndex) const
00129 {
00130   /*
00131   ** Returns the index of the triangle node, given the node index of a face index
00132   */
00133 
00134   int ret = -1;
00135 
00136   try
00137   {
00138     int faceNodes[GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00139     GetFaceNodes(faceIndex, &faceNodes[0]);
00140 
00141     ret = faceNodes[nodeIndex];
00142   }
00143 
00144   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00145   {
00146     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTriangle::GetFaceNode");
00147     throw EX;
00148   }
00149 
00150   return(ret);
00151 }

00193 bool clTriangle::InCircleCriterion(const clNode2D *theNode)
00194 {
00195   //
00196   // IN    :  *theNode = the node to be tested for
00197   // RETURN:  1 if node falls within the circumsphere of current tetrahedron
00198   //          0 if node falls outside the circumsphere of current tetrahedron
00199   //
00200 
00201   bool  ret=false;
00202 
00203   try
00204   {
00205     clNode2D         centre = GetCircumCentre();
00206     double           radius = GetRadiusCircumcircle();
00207     tpMatrix<double> coord  = theNode->GetCoordinates();
00208 
00209     double r=sqrt((theNode->x() - centre.x())*(theNode->x() - centre.x()) +
00210                   (theNode->y() - centre.y())*(theNode->y() - centre.y()));
00211 
00212     if(r<radius)
00213     {
00214 //      cout << "ID= " << GetNumberID() << "; r= " << r << "; radius= " << radius << endl;
00215       ret=true;
00216     }
00217   }
00218 
00219   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00220   {
00221     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTriangle::InCircleCriterion");
00222     throw EX;
00223   }
00224 
00225   return(ret);
00226 }
00227 
00228 void clTriangle::CalculateCircumCentre(void)
00229 {
00230   //
00231   // IN    :
00232   // RETURN:
00233   //
00234 
00235   try
00236   {
00237     if(!IsHalo())
00238     {
00239       int numberNodes = GetNumberNodes();
00240 
00241       // Retrieve the nodes
00242       int       nodeIndices[numberNodes];
00243       clNode2D *nodes[numberNodes];
00244       for(int n=0; n<numberNodes; n++)
00245       {
00246         nodeIndices[n] = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(n));
00247         nodes[n]       = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[n]);
00248       }
00249 
00250       double x1 = nodes[1]->x() - nodes[0]->x();
00251       double x2 = nodes[2]->x() - nodes[0]->x();
00252 
00253       double y1 = nodes[1]->y() - nodes[0]->y();
00254       double y2 = nodes[2]->y() - nodes[0]->y();
00255 
00256       double x12 = (nodes[1]->x() + nodes[0]->x()) * 0.5f;
00257       double x13 = (nodes[2]->x() + nodes[0]->x()) * 0.5f;
00258 
00259       double y12 = (nodes[1]->y() + nodes[0]->y()) * 0.5f;
00260       double y13 = (nodes[2]->y() + nodes[0]->y()) * 0.5f;
00261 
00262       // Setup coefficient matrix
00263       tpMatrix<double> A(2,2);
00264       A.SetElement(1, 1, x1);
00265       A.SetElement(2, 1, x2);
00266 
00267       A.SetElement(1, 2, y1);
00268       A.SetElement(2, 2, y2);
00269 
00270       // Setup solution matrix
00271       tpMatrix<double> B(2,1);
00272       B.SetElement(1, 1, x1*x12 + y1*y12);
00273       B.SetElement(2, 1, x2*x13 + y2*y13);
00274 
00275       // Solve for the centre coordinates
00276       tpMatrix<double> C = A.Solve(B);
00277 
00278       circumCentre.SetCoordinates(C(1,1),C(2,1));
00279     }
00280     else
00281     {
00282       char message[MESLEN];
00283       sprintf(message, "Tetrahedron protected.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", GetNumberID());
00284       throw clExceptionTree("clTriangle", "CalculateCircumCentre", message);
00285     }
00286   }
00287 
00288   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00289   {
00290     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTriangle::CalculateCircumCentre");
00291     throw EX;
00292   }
00293 }
00294 
00295 void clTriangle::CalculateCentroid(void)
00296 {
00297   //
00298   // Calculates the Centre of Gravity of the Tetrahedron
00299   //
00300   // IN    :
00301   // RETURN:
00302   //
00303 
00304   try
00305   {
00306     if(!IsHalo())
00307     {
00308       // Retrieve the nodes
00309       int       numberNodes = GetNumberNodes();
00310       int       nodeIndices[numberNodes];
00311       clNode2D *nodes[numberNodes];
00312       for(int n=0; n<numberNodes; n++)
00313       {
00314         nodeIndices[n] = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(n));
00315         nodes[n]       = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[n]);
00316       }
00317 
00318       double xm = (nodes[0]->x() + nodes[1]->x() + nodes[2]->x())/3.0f;
00319       double ym = (nodes[0]->y() + nodes[1]->y() + nodes[2]->y())/3.0f;
00320 
00321       centroid = clNode2D(1, xm, ym);
00322     }
00323     else
00324     {
00325       char message[MESLEN];
00326       sprintf(message, "Tetrahedron protected.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", GetNumberID());
00327       throw clExceptionTree("clTriangle", "CalculateCentroid", message);
00328     }
00329   }
00330 
00331   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00332   {
00333     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTriangle::CalculateCentroid");
00334     throw EX;
00335   }
00336 }
00337 
00338 void clTriangle::CalculateRadiusCircumsphere(void)
00339 {
00340   try
00341   {
00342     // TODO: Is centrePoint hier ALTIJD al uitgerekend -> needs checking
00343     int              nodeIndex = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(0));
00344     clNode2D        *node      = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndex);
00345 
00346     double           x = node->x()-circumCentre.x();
00347     double           y = node->y()-circumCentre.y();
00348 
00349     radiusCircumcircle = sqrt(x*x + y*y);
00350   }
00351 
00352   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00353   {
00354     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTriangle::CalculateRadiusCircumsphere");
00355     throw EX;
00356   }
00357 }
00358 
00359 void clTriangle::CalculateArea(void)
00360 {
00361   /*
00362   ** Returns the are of the element
00363   */
00364   try
00365   {
00366     // Retrieve the nodes
00367     int       numberNodes = GetNumberNodes();
00368     int       nodeIndices[numberNodes];
00369     clNode2D *nodes[numberNodes];
00370     for(int n=0; n<numberNodes; n++)
00371     {
00372       nodeIndices[n] = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(n));
00373       nodes[n]       = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[n]);
00374     }
00375 
00376     double x1 = nodes[0]->x();
00377     double y1 = nodes[0]->y();
00378 
00379     double x2 = nodes[1]->x();
00380     double y2 = nodes[1]->y();
00381 
00382     double x3 = nodes[2]->x();
00383     double y3 = nodes[2]->y();
00384 
00385     double det1 = x2*y3 - x3*y2;
00386     double det2 = x1*y3 - x3*y1;
00387     double det3 = x1*y2 - x2*y1;
00388     double det  = det1 - det2 + det3;
00389 
00390     if(det==0.0f)
00391     {
00392       char message[MESLEN];
00393       sprintf(message, "Invalid triangle.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", GetNumberID());
00394       throw clExceptionTree("clTriangle", "CalculateArea", message);
00395     }
00396     else
00397     {
00398       area = det/2.0f;
00399     }
00400   }
00401 
00402   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00403   {
00404     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTriangle::CalculateArea");
00405     throw EX;
00406   }
00407 }
00408 
00409 void clTriangle::CalculateCharacteristics(void)
00410 {
00411   try
00412   {
00413     if(!IsHalo() && !IsInitialised())
00414     {
00415       CalculateCircumCentre();
00416       CalculateCentroid();
00417       CalculateRadiusCircumsphere();
00418       CalculateArea();
00419       SetInitialised();
00420     }
00421   }
00422 
00423   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00424   {
00425     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTriangle::CalculateCharacteristics");
00426     throw EX;
00427   }
00428 }
00429 
00430 clNode2D clTriangle::GetCircumCentre(void)
00431 {
00432   CalculateCharacteristics();
00433   return(circumCentre);
00434 }
00435 
00436 clNode2D clTriangle::GetCentroid(void)
00437 {

00442 double clTriangle::GetRadiusCircumcircle(void)
00443 {

00445   return(radiusCircumcircle);
